text: Barry Sanders (born ) is a Hall of Fame and Heisman Trophy winning American football running back. He played college football at Oklahoma State University, then spent all of his professional career with the Detroit Lions in the NFL. Widely recognized as the greatest running back of all time next to Emmitt Smith and if not that then definitely the best elusive back of all time. Category:American football running backs Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Wichita, Kansas Category:Heisman Trophy winners
title: Barry Sanders
